room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works" by Puzzle Effect Boise in Boise
review: Escape room Boise is a phenomenal experience. The game rooms are so much fun that I have been back a few times to try them all! The people working there when my group went were Alex and Eli. They were so nice and so funny- really made the experience!!!

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works" by Puzzle Effect Boise in Boise
review: The staff was friendly and enthusiastic and the room was enjoyable! The only thing I would change is the concept of not having a leaderboard, I find that enjoyable to shoot for.

room_title: Escape room "Pipe Works" by Puzzle Effect Boise in Boise
review: Went here with couple co-workers and our spouses and we had a ton of fun. It was fun doing the pipe works room and it was a blast working together and seeing who could figure stuff out quickly. This was my first escape room and I don't think it was incredibly difficult , but challenging enough that we couldn't just fly through the room. If you've never tried an escape room it was a lot of fun and you should try it too!
